metadata.title: CVE-2022-31744 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An attacker could have injected CSS into stylesheets accessible viainternal URIs, such as resource:, and in doing so bypass a page's ContentSecurity Policy. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 91.11,Thunderbird < 102, Thunderbird < 91.11, and Firefox < 101.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-31744` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 101.0.1+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 101.0.1+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 101.0.1+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

thunderbird - 1:91.11.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:91.11.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:91.11.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:91.11.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:91.11.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:91.11.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required
